source.c76083de:
def change_date(x):
    import datetime
    hour = x.split(':')[1]
    date = x.split(':')[0]
    
    if hour == '24':
        hour = '00:00:00'
        
        FinalDate = pd.to_datetime(date+' '+hour) + datetime.timedelta(days=1)
    else:
        hout = hour + ':00:00'
        FinalDate = pd.to_datetime(date + ' ' + hour)
    return FinalDate

df['(년-월-일:시)'] = df['(년-월-일:시)'].apply(change_date)
df.head()
